name: Shippio, Inc.
description: Operator of a logistics platform intended to manage the development and deployment of shipping logistics. The company's platform offers a dedicated dashboard for import and export management with the streamlined arrangement of import or export processes, centralized management of large amounts of data, and speedy customer support, enabling shipping companies to create the necessary documents for importing and exporting transactions, saving time and cost.
one_liner: Operator of a logistics platform intended to manage the development and deployment of shipping logistics. The company's platform offers a dedicated dashboard for import and export management with the streamlined arrangement of import or export processes, centralized management of large amounts of data, and speedy customer support, enabling shipping companies to create the necessary documents for importing and exporting transactions, saving time and cost.
